Article.ArticleTitle: Unresolved Systemic Inflammation, Long COVID, and the Common Pathomechanisms of Somatic and Psychiatric Comorbidity.

Abstract.AbstractText: Monoamine hypothesis is an overestimated hypothesis of major depressive disorder (MDD), and the treatments and biomarkers that target it only show modest effect in randomized controlled trials+ (RCTs) or case-control studies [...].
